summary: A documentary about actor/director Dennis Hopper, showing him at his home and studio putting together his film The Last Movie (1971).
cast: Dennis Hopper|Princess Lida Amun|L.M. Kit Carson|Lawrence Schiller|Lois Ursone|Zack Van Arsdale
keywords: independent filmmaking|film making|creative process|film maker|making of
director: Directors: L.M. Kit Carson, Lawrence Schiller
title: The American Dreamer
